#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int min(int a,int b,int c)
{
     return((a<b&&a<c)?a:((b<c)?b:c));
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,c,w,m,total,men,women,children;
     cin>>t;
     while(t--)
     {
      cin>>total>>men>>women>>children;
      c=min(children,12*men,(4*total/5));
      c=min(c,10001,(men+women)*4);
      total=total-c;
      w=min(women,2*men,(2*total/3));
      total=total-w;
      if(total<men)
	  m=total;
	  else
	  m=men;
      printf("%d %d %d\n",m,w,c);
      }
    return 0;
}
